DOC.brief_summary: Aim of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of a range of doses of tamsulosin hydrochloride as treatment in children with an elevated detrusor leak point pressure associated with a known neurological deficit
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Tamsulosin in Children With Neurogenic Bladder
DOC.criteria: Neuropathic bladder secondary to a known neurologic deficit (e.g. spina bifida) Elevated detrusor leak point pressures (LPP) â‰¥40 cm H2O confirmed by two measurements Clinically significant abnormalities as determined by the investigator A history of relevant orthostatic hypotension, fainting spells or blackouts
